statements: SELECT * FROM patient_data;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patient_data;
SELECT patient_id, diagnosis FROM patient_data WHERE age > 50;
SELECT * FROM patient_data WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, symptoms FROM patient_data WHERE diagnosis = 'Fever';
SELECT * FROM patient_data WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patient_data WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT patient_name, symptoms, diagnosis FROM patient_data WHERE symptoms LIKE '%fever%' OR diagnosis LIKE '%pneumonia%';
SELECT patient_name, age, gender, symptoms, diagnosis FROM patient_data WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40 AND gender = 'Female' ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM patient_data WHERE age >= 18 AND age <= 60 ORDER BY patient_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM patients ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_id, name, address FROM patients WHERE blood_type = 'O+';
SELECT patient_id, symptom_name, severity, timestamp FROM symptoms ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT patient_id, name, gender FROM patients WHERE blood_type = 'O+' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_id, address FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female' AND age BETWEEN 18 AND 25;
SELECT symptom_name, severity, timestamp FROM symptoms WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY severity DESC;
SELECT p.name, s.symptom_name, s.severity FROM patients p JOIN symptoms s ON p.patient_id = s.patient_id WHERE p.gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender, patient_weight FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 30;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, patient_age, patient_gender, patient_height, patient_weight FROM patients ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT ps.patient_id, p.patient_name, s.symptom_name, ps.date_reported FROM patient_symptoms ps JOIN patients p ON ps.patient_id = p.patient_id JOIN symptoms s ON ps.symptom_id = s.symptom_id;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender FROM patients WHERE patient_height > 170 AND patient_gender = 'Female';
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(symptom_id) as total_symptoms FROM patient_symptoms GROUP BY patient_id HAVING total_symptoms > 3;

SELECT patient_name, symptom_name, date_reported FROM patients JOIN patient_symptoms ON patients.patient_id = patient_symptoms.patient_id JOIN symptoms ON symptoms.symptom_id = patient_symptoms.symptom_id WHERE date_reported BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT patient_id, AVG(patient_height) as average_height, AVG(patient_weight) as average_weight FROM patients GROUP BY patient_id ORDER BY average_height DESC, average_weight ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT symptom_name, description FROM Symptoms WHERE LENGTH(description) > 100;
SELECT patient_name, symptom_name, diagnosis_date FROM Patients JOIN Diagnoses ON Patients.patient_id = Diagnoses.patient_id;
SELECT treatment_name, start_date, end_date FROM Treatments ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender, address FROM Patients WHERE age > 30
SELECT diagnosis_date, treatment_name, start_date, end_date FROM Diagnoses JOIN Treatments ON Diagnoses.diagnosis_id = Treatments.diagnosis_id
SELECT patient_name, symptom_name, description FROM Patients JOIN Diagnoses ON Patients.patient_id = Diagnoses.patient_id JOIN Symptoms ON Diagnoses.symptom_id = Symptoms.symptom_id
SELECT DISTINCT gender FROM Patients
SELECT treatment_name, COUNT(treatment_id) AS treatment_count FROM Treatments GROUP BY treatment_name
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender='Female';
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis_name, diagnosis_date FROM Patients JOIN Diagnoses ON Patients.patient_id = Diagnoses.patient_id;

SELECT patient_name, treatment_name, medication_name, dosage FROM Patients JOIN Diagnoses ON Patients.patient_id = Diagnoses.patient_id JOIN Treatments ON Diagnoses.diagnosis_id = Treatments.diagnosis_id;
SELECT symptom_name, description FROM Symptoms;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT patient_name FROM Patients WHERE blood_type = 'AB';

SELECT Patients.patient_name, Diagnoses.diagnosis_name, Treatments.medication_name FROM Patients JOIN Diagnoses ON Patients.patient_id = Diagnoses.patient_id JOIN Treatments ON Diagnoses.diagnosis_id = Treatments.diagnosis_id;
SELECT patient_name, condition_name, treatment_name FROM Patients JOIN MedicalHistory ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalHistory.patient_id ORDER BY MedicalHistory.diagnosis_date DESC;
